channel.title: Career Progression on Prasenjit Manna
channel.description: Recent content in Career Progression on Prasenjit Manna

item.title: Career Progression
item.description: Self Improvement How I optimised my life to make my job redundant - Troy Hunt’s point of view Write a brag document - Get your work recognized: write a brag document You Are Your Own Best Hype Person Brag now, remember later: Document your accomplishments Being visible - Why visibility matters Being Glue - If you stop doing those things, the team won’t be as successful. But now someone’s suggesting that you might be happier in a less technical role.
